name: Crush
description: Crush is an old-school-styled shoot´em up. The game leads you through 7 challenging levels filled with action and great soundtracks. A must for all old-school shoot´em up fans!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 10 compatibl
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 1024 MB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 10 compatible
